'''''Sternest of Souls''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[Azhdaha (Weekly Boss)|Azhdaha]] in all 4 of its elemental combinations: Electro/Hydro, Cryo/Pyro, Cryo/Hydro, and Electro/Pyro.

==Gameplay Notes==
The domain entrance is marked with the elements that Azhdaha will absorb inside the domain, which change every week based on a fixed rotation.
